edu.ucla.sspace.matrix
Interface Transform

All Known Implementing Classes:
CorrelationTransform, LogEntropyTransform, NoTransform, TfIdfTransform
public interface Transform

An interface for Matrix transformations. These tranformations should support both a Matrix and a serialized Matrix stored in a File, in one of the supported matrix formats. Implementations are strongly encouraged to implement the toString method, as many SemanticSpace implementations will use this when serializing.

Author:
David Jurgens

Method Summary
 File transform(File inputMatrixFile, MatrixIO.Format format)
          Transforms the matrix in the file using the an implemented method and returns a temporary file containing the result.

          Transforms the input matrix using the implemented method and writes the result to the file for the output matrix.
 Matrix transform(Matrix input)
          Returns a transformed matrix based on the given matrix.
 

Method Detail

transform

File transform(File inputMatrixFile,
               MatrixIO.Format format)
               throws IOException
Transforms the matrix in the file using the an implemented method and returns a temporary file containing the result.

Parameters:
inputMatrixFile - a file containing a matrix in the specified format
format - the format of the matrix
Returns:
a file with the transformed version of the input. This file is marked to be deleted when the JVM exits.
Throws:
IOException - if any error occurs while reading the input matrix or writing the output matrix

transform

void transform(File inputMatrixFile,
               MatrixIO.Format inputFormat,
               File outputMatrixFile)
               throws IOException
Transforms the input matrix using the implemented method and writes the result to the file for the output matrix.

Parameters:
inputMatrixFile - a file containing a matrix in the specified format
format - the format of the input matrix, and the format in which the output matrix will be written
outputMatrixFile - the file to which the transformed matrix will be written
Throws:
IOException - if any error occurs while reading the input matrix or writing the output matrix

transform

Matrix transform(Matrix input)
Returns a transformed matrix based on the given matrix.

Parameters:
matrix - the matrix to be transformed
Returns:
the transformed version of the input matrix
